alert.note: Alert for Perkins County; Ziebach County (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 02 at 2:16PM MDT until August 02 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 328 AND 330... .Red flag or near red flag conditions will continue across portions of northwest into north central South Dakota through late today. Relative humidities of 10 to 15 percent and wind gusts of 20 to 30 mph can be expected through late afternoon. Conditions will gradually improve toward sunset. ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 328 AND 330... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zones 328 Perkins County and 330 Ziebach County. * WINDS...Northwest 10 to 15 mph with gusts to around 25 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 10 percent. * IMPACTS...The combination of gusty winds and low relative humidity would produce critical fire weather conditions.
info.instruction: A red flag warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
